data.text:
Hotel Sorgente

Aglientu

Set in the Sardinian village of Aglientu, Hotel Sorgente is 9 km away from Vignola Mare Beach. It features air-conditioned rooms, and a restaurant offering traditional dishes from the island... view morefrom

€ 60Hotel Santa Maria Turismo Rurale

Aglientu

On a quiet hill surrounded by lush nature, Hotel Santa Maria is close to the Mediterranean sea. With a swimming pool, snack bar and sun terrace, it offers views reaching as far as Corsica... view moreResidence Mirice

Aglientu

Featuring a garden and seasonal outdoor pool, Residence Mirice is 850 metres from Vignola Mare beach, in Aglientu. Palau, with its archeological site and its harbour, liking to the Maddalena Archipelago, is 33 km away... view morefrom

€ 35Sardinia Beach Apartments

Aglientu

Offering independent air-conditioned apartments with private garden, the Sardinia Beach boasts a free tennis court and an outdoor pool with sun terrace. It lies about 600 metres from the crystal-clear sea... view moreStazzo La Foci By Trere'

Aglientu

Located 1 km from the sandy beach of Vignola Mare, Stazzo La Foci By Trere' is a restored traditional Sardinian farm house. It offers self-catering accommodation with sea views and a garden... view more
